trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SelectionEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SelectionChange" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Selected" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Deselected" /> events of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.SelectionChange" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Selected" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Deselected" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SelectionEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.SelectionEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control with text to the document and then creates an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件带到文档的文本，然后创建一个事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.Selected>事件。

trans-unit.source: A message box is displayed when you move the cursor into the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 当你将光标移到书签时，显示一个消息框。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
